fields.name: Recovery
fields.description: Should be able to hold a conversation with ease throughout the session

fields.name: Tempo
fields.description: Looking at around 80% of your maximum effort

fields.name: Efforts
fields.description: 100% effort on the ons and walk or jog the offs

fields.name: Race
fields.description: 100% maximum effort, give it everything you have!

fields.name: LR
fields.description: conversational pace with selfie/snack breaks as often as needed

fields.name: Negative splits
fields.description: Increase the pace so you get faster as the session goes on.

fields.name: runwalk
fields.description: Gentle pace, just above a jog, on the run parts and walking on the walking parts
